```{r}
source_rmd = function(file, ...) {
  tmp_file = tempfile(fileext=".R")
  on.exit(unlink(tmp_file), add = TRUE)
  knitr::purl(file, output=tmp_file)
  source(file = tmp_file, ...)
}
```
```{r}
source_rmd("shoulder/meta-analysis/data preperation and cleaning.rmd")

export_status = FALSE
export_summary = FALSE
export_path = "shoulder/meta-analysis/output/"
# get_wh(p,unit="cm")
source_rmd("shoulder/meta-analysis/meta-analysis.rmd")
```
```{r}
name  <- "meta-analysis data.csv"
write.csv(df_diag,paste(export_path,name,sep = ""))
```
